sampleBuysFromMStable(address,address,ad.details: Sample buy quotes from MStable contract

params.makerToken: Address of the maker token (what to buy).
params.makerTokenAmounts: Maker token buy amount for each sample.
params.takerToken: Address of the taker token (what to sell).

returns.takerTokenAmounts: Taker amounts sold at each maker token         amount.

sampleSellsFromMStable(address,address,a.details: Sample sell quotes from the mStable contract

params.makerToken: Address of the maker token (what to buy).
params.takerToken: Address of the taker token (what to sell).
params.takerTokenAmounts: Taker token sell amount for each sample.

returns.makerTokenAmounts: Maker amounts bought at each taker token         amount.

DEFAULT_CALL_GAS.details: Default gas limit for mStable calls.
